My Work

Here is what I have been up to:

Code Snippet Cheat Sheet

I wanted to create a place where I could store and sort all of my random code snippets in a single place accessable from anywhere. This was a personal project for me to dive into the world of React and the MERN stack. It's built with a custom backend API using Node, Express and MongoDB. The development is ongoing.

  • MongoDB
  • Express
  • React
  • Node.js
  • JavaScript
  • HTML5
  • CSS3
  • Heroku

 Project Github

Personal Website Rework

After returning to the world of Web Development I needed a home for all of my ongoing and future projects. I decided to build a simple HTML powered website using a little JavaScript and CSS including animations and transitions.

  • JavaScript
  • HTML5
  • CSS3
  • SASS

 Project Github

Smith Mountain Lake Golf Carts Website

This project was built for the client to be able to showcase their golf cart builds for the newly established Smith Mountain Lake Golf Carts company in Moneta, VA. The clients requirements were to be able to edit the website sections and content themselves.

  • Wordpress
  • HTML5
  • CSS3
  • JavasScript
